alert.note: Alert for Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 26 at 1:21PM MST until November 29 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, except 4 to 12 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Sawtooth and Stanley Basins, and the Wood River Basin, including the towns of Stanley, Galena, Ketchum, and Hailey. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Wind greater than 15 mph can create a blowing snow hazard, with heavy drifting and a sudden change to near zero visibility for motorists. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
